TopicTitle: Line of sight with kerbonaut's awe?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to complete a satellite mission that requires placing a satellite in Sun orbit at 1,500,000km AND "in line-of-sight with kerbonaut's awe".

What and/or where is "Kerbonaut's Awe"? Is that a star, satellite, or object that I have to discover?

Thanks!

Edited February 17, 2015 by imethan
Mark as answered

It's a randomly generated name for a contract's point of interest.

If you go to the tracking center and focus on the sun, you should see it as a waypoint marker with a dish icon.

Once you accept the contract, you'll be able to see the same marker in map view (again when the view is focused on the sun or a vessel in the sun's SoI.

Edit: And to actually answer the question you asked () it's a point on the surface of the sun.

Edited February 17, 2015 by AlexinTokyo
Mission Accomplished! Thanks for the quick response!
